title: Any way to place back button on the right on Android 10 when using 2 or 3 button navigation?
content:
Hi!

I was able to achieve this with the adb command:

adb shell
settings put secure sysui_nav_bar "space,recent;home;back,space"

but it seems like it doesn't work any more on Android 10.

Any way to place the back button on the right??

Thanks!!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
